name: wallet

A2 a small folding case for carrying paper money, credit cards and other flat objects, that can be carried in a pocket and is used especially by men: He pulled out a big, fat wallet stuffed with banknotes. Synonym
billfold US
Sergiy1975/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
US (UK purse) a small container for carrying coins, paper money, and credit cards, used especially by women
Ng Sok Lian/EyeEm/GettyImages
a flat, folding bag that is used for holding documents, for example passports
Coprid/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages

Thank God.They acted honourably and returned the wallet.
